definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The research center is carrying out a thorough study of this metal's superconductivity.
sentences.chinese: 正在对这种金属的超导电性进行深入研究。

sentences.english: In chapter 5, ECT techniques for scanning inspection of defects in multi-layered structures are studied.
sentences.chinese: 第五章研究了多层导电结构缺陷电涡流扫描检测技术。

sentences.english: Nonmetals are generally gases or soft solids that do not conduct electricity.
sentences.chinese: 非金属一般为气体或不导电的软固体。

sentences.english: Metal's ability to conduct electricity is due to the loosely held electrons found in metals.
sentences.chinese: 金属之所以导电是因为金属里有自由移动的电子。

sentences.english: A conductive spike is created thus causing a dead short.
sentences.chinese: 一导电用大钉钉牢如此创造引起死者。

sentences.english: Remove the film, connect the electrical wire to the electrode with the clip.
sentences.chinese: 将防粘膜撕开，用导电线夹头与电极金属扣联接。

sentences.english: Polyiodides have important applications in the bactericidal and electric fields.
sentences.chinese: 它在杀菌和导电方面都有着重要应用。

sentences.english: The second part is the application of SE in transparent and conductive ITO thin films.
sentences.chinese: 第二，椭偏测量术在透明导电ITO薄膜中的应用。

sentences.english: Modification with conductive materials to increase specific capacity at high current density.
sentences.chinese: 导电性物质的修饰以提高其在大电流密度下的比容量。

sentences.english: Metal nickel powder, its prepn. method, conductive paste and multi-layer ceramic capacitor.
sentences.chinese: 金属镍粉，其制备方法，导电膏和多层陶瓷电容器。

sentences.english: The conducting property of this composite ceramic material was explained with percolation model.
sentences.chinese: 同时对复合陶瓷材料的导电特性用渗漏模型作了解释。

sentences.english: In the paper, the alternative characters of current electric conduction of rock-coal porous medium with gas are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了煤岩多孔介质及其充瓦斯后的交流导电性。

sentences.english: Bonding reliability of electrically conductive adhesives(ECAs)is very important to their application.
sentences.chinese: 导电胶的粘接可靠性是制约其应用的主要影响因素。

sentences.english: Sometimes the carbon rods are copper coated to improve electrical conductivity.
sentences.chinese: 有时这些碳棒包上一层铜，以增加其导电性。

sentences.english: Higher the content of reactants and the sintering temperature are, better the electrical property is.
sentences.chinese: 反应原材料成分及烧结温度越高则导电性能越好。
